api_list.name: /v1/datetime/now/{timezone}
api_list.description: Get the current date/time of that timezone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datetime6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/datetime/now/Asia.Bangkok"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datetime6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datetime6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/datetime/now/{timezone}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datetime6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /v1/datetime/{date}/{time}/{nHours}
api_list.description: Get the date/time before/after N hours of that timezone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datetime6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/datetime/2022-05-01/12:00:00/6"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datetime6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datetime6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/datetime/{date}/{time}/{nhours}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datetime6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
